languages.text: "Я надеялась... ты отличаешься от нее. Напрасно. Поступай же так, как велит тебе твое человеческое сердце. Ибо в руинах души мон-кай этому изгою более нет места". {n}Долгое время вокс Ирлиэт не издает ни звука.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я надеялась... ты отличаешься от нее. Напрасно. Мон-кай остается мон-кай хоть в объятиях звезд, хоть в пыли сгинувшего мира. Поступай же так, как велит тебе твое человеческое сердце. Ибо в руинах души мон-кай этому изгою более нет места". {n}Долгое время вокс Ирлиэт не издает ни звука.{/n} "Но я не позволю собратьям так просто опустошить очередной сосуд горя. Таков уж мой Путь".

languages.text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я надеялась... ты отличаешься от нее. Напрасно. Поступай же так, как велит тебе твое человеческое сердце. Ибо в руинах души мон-кай этому изгою более нет места". {n}Долгое время вокс Ирлиэт не издает ни звука.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. A mon-keigh will stay a mon-keigh no matter where you find {mf|him|her}, be it among the stars or in the ashes of a dead world. Do as your human heart commands, for this exile no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh's soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n} "But I will not let my kin drain another vessel of grief down to the bitter dregs. Such is my Path."

"I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. A mon-keigh will stay a mon-keigh no matter where you find {mf|him|her}, be it among the stars or in the ashes of a dead world. Do as your human heart commands, for this exile no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh's soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n} "But I will not let my kin drain another vessel of grief down to the bitter dregs. Such is my Path."

"I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. A mon-keigh will remain a mon-keigh no matter where you find {mf|him|her}, be it among the stars or in the ashes of a dead world. Do as your human heart commands, for this exile no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n} "But I will not let my kin drain another vessel of grief down to the bitter dregs. Such is my Path."

"I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

"I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

languages.text: « J'espérais que... vous n'étiez pas comme elle. Je me berçais d'illusions. Faites ce que vous dicte votre cœur d'{mf|humain|humaine}, car l'Errante que je suis n'a plus sa place dans le champ de ruines qu'est l'âme des mon-keigh. » {n}Le système-vox d'Yrliet reste muet un long moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « J'espérais que... vous n'étiez pas comme elle. Je me berçais d'illusions. Faites ce que vous dicte votre cœur d'{mf|humain|humaine}, car l'Errante que je suis n'a plus sa place dans le champ de ruines qu'est l'âme des mon-keigh. » {n}Le système-vox d'Yrliet reste muet un long moment.{/n}

languages.text: “我本希望……你会和你的前任不一样，但这只不过是我一厢情愿罢了。遵从你身为人类的意愿吧。至于这位流浪者，她在猴子灵魂的废墟之中，已经再无立足之地。”{n}伊莉耶特沉默了很久。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我本希望……你会和你的前任不一样，但这只不过是我一厢情愿罢了。遵从你身为人类的意愿吧。至于这位流浪者，她在猴子灵魂的废墟之中，已经再无立足之地。”{n}伊莉耶特沉默了很久。{/n}

languages.text: "Ich hatte gehofft ... Ihr wäret anders. Es war eine vergebliche Hoffnung. Tut, was Euer menschliches Herz Euch befiehlt, denn dieser Ausgestoßene hat in den Ruinen der Chem-Pan-Sey-Seele keinen Platz mehr." {n}Yrliets Vox bleibt lange stumm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte gehofft ... Ihr wäret anders. Es war eine vergebliche Hoffnung. Ein Chem-Pan-Sey bleibt immer ein Chem-Pan-Sey. Wo man ihn auch findet, ob in den Sternen oder in der Asche einer toten Welt. Tut, was Euer menschliches Herz Euch befiehlt, denn dieser Ausgestoßene hat in den Ruinen der Chem-Pan-Sey-Seele keinen Platz mehr." {n}Yrliets Vox bleibt lange stumm.{/n} "Doch ich lasse nicht zu, dass meine Verwandten ein weiteres Behältnis der Trauer bis zum letzten bitteren Tropfen leeren. Das ist mein Pfad."

"Ich hatte gehofft ... Ihr wäret anders. Es war eine vergebliche Hoffnung. Ein Chem-Pan-Sey bleibt immer ein Chem-Pan-Sey. Wo man ihn auch findet, ob in den Sternen oder in der Asche einer toten Welt. Tut, was Euer menschliches Herz Euch befiehlt, denn dieser Ausgestoßene hat in den Ruinen der Chem-Pan-Sey-Seele keinen Platz mehr." {n}Yrliets Vox bleibt lange stumm.{/n} "Doch ich lasse nicht zu, dass meine Verwandten ein weiteres Behältnis der Trauer bis zum letzten bitteren Tropfen leeren. Das ist mein Pfad."

languages.text: «Esperaba... esperaba que fueses diferente a ella. Una esperanza vana. Haz lo que tu corazón humano te diga, pues esta proscrita no encontrará su hogar entre las ruinas del alma mon-keigh». {n}El voco de Yrliet guarda un largo silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esperaba... esperaba que fueses diferente a ella. Una esperanza vana. Haz lo que tu corazón humano te diga, pues esta proscrita no encontrará su hogar entre las ruinas del alma mon-keigh». {n}El voco de Yrliet guarda un largo silencio.{/n}

languages.text: 「我は…あなたが彼女とは違うと期待していた。無駄な望みだった。人間の心の命じるままにするがいい。この追放者は、もはやモン＝ケイの魂の廃墟に、居場所はない」 {n}ユリエットのヴォクスはしばらくの間、沈黙した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我は…あなたが彼女とは違うと期待していた。無駄な望みだった。人間の心の命じるままにするがいい。この追放者は、もはやモン＝ケイの魂の廃墟に、居場所はない」 {n}ユリエットのヴォクスはしばらくの間、沈黙した。{/n}

languages.text: "Bir yanım... Ondan farklı olacağını umuyordu. Nafileymiş. İnsan yüreğin nasıl dilerse öyle yap. Belli ki mon-keigh ruhunun yıkıntılarında bu Yurtsuz'a yer kalmamış." {n}Yrliet'in voksu, uzun bir süre sessiz kalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I was hoping... you would be different from her. It was a vain hope. Do as your human heart commands, for this Outcast no longer has a place in the ruins of the mon-keigh soul." {n}Yrliet's vox remains silent for a long while.{/n}
